Articles.Content:
Heya,

since UbioZur's Welding-mod isn't operational right now, I wanted to ask if there's a tutorial around that explains how to weld parts. Especially when it comes to angles (like, welding a huge wheel made out of 1x1 or 2x2 steel plates).

I would really like to know this.

Not being a jerk, but you kind of answered your own question.

It looks like squad changed the way part attachment is coded. I tried to figure what was going on (admittedly not very long and with control surfaces) and didn't figure it out. I should try again with only structural parts.

May be out of luck for awhile...

Uhm, didn't answer it myself, actually ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I just know that UbioZur's Mod doesn't work XD What and why wasn't known to me.
